title: COUDN"T JOIN GAME ON 100% load and warning message
body:
Just played a game that made me sigh.
I was on loading screen and reached 100%.
Except for one enemy who wasn't connected (according to what my screen said), everyone was on 100%.
But game didn't start for like 10 min.
I thought it was very weird so i reconnected for 2 times, then i could go in game.
It was already 13 minutes after the start, and obviously our team lost.
After the game,

I RECEIVED A WARNING MESSAGE
that asked me to type 'I Agree' to not leaving games anymore.
WHAT IS THIS BULL SHI T?

replies.body: Trying custom games and hitting 5-10 fps with lowest setting when i get about 150 on medium settings. Amazing patch by Riot.
